specialities.heading: JavaScript
specialities.description: With over 2 years experience using JavaScript [ECMA5-11] building websites, react and angular apps.

specialities.heading: React
specialities.description:
2 years experience building various React projects from a Markdown Previewer, Drum Machine and amazon clone. As well as 6 months experience 
        working as a React developer for a startup.

specialities.heading: Redux
specialities.description: When using React, Redux is my go to state manager which is paired with redux thunk and reselect

specialities.heading: GraphQL
specialities.description:
An alternative to Redux which I love is GraphQL. I use this as query language for my API's. I have been using
        this for almost a year.
